task_instruction: lift open green garbage can lid
task_summary: Perceive the green bin lid, approach and align, grasp the lid handle, lift along +Z to open the lid, then retreat.

node_specs.description: Actively scan to find the target.
Move to a pose above the target.
Refine pose and align to grasp.
Back off to a safe distance.

assumptions: Green bin lid has a graspable lip/handle accessible from the side/top.
Hinge allows upward opening with modest torque.
Workspace around the bin is collision-free for a short vertical lift.
failure_modes: Insufficient lift due to hinge friction
recovery_strategy: If not visible, ScanForTarget via Fallback
If ContainerOpen not satisfied, re-align and re-lift
Fallback to operator if repeated grasp instability

local_annotations.note: Scene with green bin under desk; arm far right, approaching.
End-effector at lid handle area; ready to grasp.
Upward motion consistent with lid opening.
Retreat from bin after opening action.

symbols_map.green_bin_lid: target lid surface/handle on the green garbage can
symbols_map.axis:+z: lifting direction to open the hinged lid
